subject: Football
Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. has talked to the World Anti-Doping Agency about overseeing testing for performance-enhancing drugs, an official briefed on its planning said.
snippet: The N.F.L. has talked to the World Anti-Doping Agency about overseeing testing for performance-enhancing drugs, an official briefed on its planning said.
